text:
Question 67) After seven years of the occupation of abandoned land in Santo Andr√©, in ABC Paulista, the condominiums Novo Pinheirinho and Santos Dias were inaugurated, with the presence of representatives of the federal, state and municipal governments. The occupation began in 2012 and, since then, the movement had been claiming the right to enjoy the space for the construction of houses. The Magna Carta, in its art. 6th, guarantees to all Brazilians the right to housing.
The text presents a strategy used by the social movement to
A) Weakened the public power.
B) foster the solidarity economy.
C) Control state property.
D) guarantee the constitutional precept.
E) encourage real estate speculation.
